commands.name: modifiers.listallmodifiers
commands.description: Prints all items with modifiers, and the modifiers themselves, to the server console.

commands.name: modifiers.listmodifiers
commands.description: Prints all modifiers for a specific item to the server console.
commands.effect: Prints all modifiers for the Rock item to the server console.

commands.name: modifiers.clearallmodifiers
commands.description: Removes all modifiers from all items.

commands.name: modifiers.clearmodifier
commands.description: Removes a previously applied modifier from an item, or all modifiers if 'all' is specified.

examples.effect: Removes the collection modifier from the Rock item.
Removes all modifiers from the Rock item.

commands.name: modifiers.setmodifier collection
commands.description: Sets the relative collection rate of 'pickup-ables' like nodettes and harvestables like hemp.
commands.effect: Doubles (2x) stone pickup from stone nodettes.

commands.name: modifiers.setmodifier gather
commands.description: Sets the relative collection rate of 'gatherables' like trees and ore-nodes.
commands.effect: Triples wood gather rate on trees.

commands.name: modifiers.setmodifier tool
commands.description: Sets the relative 'gather rate' of a tool.

commands.name: modifiers.setmodifier loot
commands.description: Sets the relative amount of 'loot' that spawns.
commands.effect: Triples (3x) the amount of scrap spawned from scrap resources.

commands.name: modifiers.setmodifier cookspeed
commands.description: Sets the relative 'cooking speed' of furnace-able items.
commands.effect: Triples (3x) the cook speed of Metal Ore.

commands.name: modifiers.setmodifier cookamount
commands.description: Sets the relative 'cooking yield' of a furnace-able item.

commands.name: craft.furnaceusagemultiplier
commands.description: Controls the relative amount of Low Grade Fuel that furnaces use.
commands.effect: Furnaces will burn twice as much fuel when active.

commands.name: craft.itemcookspeedmultiplier
commands.description: Controls the relative speed of Furnace cooking.
commands.effect: Furnaces will cook twice as fast.
